definition: Wade (name)/Sir Thomas Francis Wade (1818-1895), sinologist 威妥瑪|威妥玛[Wei1 Tuo3 ma3]
Medvedyev (name)/Dmitry Anatolyevich Medvedev (1965-), Russian lawyer and politician, president of Russian Federation from 2008

Lü Buwei (?291-235 BC), merchant and politician of the State of Qin 秦國|秦国[Qin2 guo2], subsequent Qin Dynasty 秦代[Qin2 dai4] Chancellor, allegedly the father of Ying Zheng 嬴政[Ying2 Zheng4], who subsequently became the first emperor Qin Shihuang 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]
Waley or Whaley (name)/Arthur Waley (1889-1966), pioneer British sinologist
Maxwell (name)/James Clerk Maxwell (1831-1879), Scottish physicist and mathematician, the originator of Maxwell's laws of electromagnetism and electromagnetic waves
Alfred Wegener (1880-1930), German meteorologist and geophysicist, the originator of the theory of continental drift/also written 魏格納|魏格纳
François Viète (1540-1603), French mathematician, father of modern algebraic notation

pinyin: Bi3 ya4 wei2 si1 tuo1 ke4

sentences.english: They were less accurate – 76 per cent – when using signals from Wernicke’s area.
sentences.chinese: 使用韦尼克区信号时，精确率有些低，76%。

sentences.english: The other is Wernicke's area, farther back in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 另一个是脑后部的韦尼克氏区。

sentences.english: Play as Alex and Justin by serving customers in the Waverly Sub Station.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯和贾斯汀扮演的韦弗利子站的客户服务。

sentences.english: I remember you knew her at Weymouth, and a fine girl she is.
sentences.chinese: 我记得你是在韦默斯认识她的，她可是个好姑娘啊。

sentences.english: At the Mariveles Navy headquarters he said good-bye to his work gang.
sentences.chinese: 他在马里韦莱斯海军司令部向他的那帮工人告别。

sentences.english: Both Mr Woerth and Mr Sarkozy deny any wrongdoing in the case.
sentences.chinese: 韦尔特和萨科齐都否认在这个案件里做过任何错事。

sentences.english: Oseltamivir remains the drug of first choice recommended by WHO.
sentences.chinese: 奥司他韦仍然是世卫组织推荐的首选药物。

sentences.english: Mister Webre shows the dancers the outline of the dance.
sentences.chinese: 韦布尔先生会给舞蹈演员们描述舞蹈的概要。

sentences.english: For protecting a son, the Wei is graceful beautiful only bear with, even the intravenous drops all loathe to give up a dozen.
sentences.chinese: 为了保儿子，韦雅丽只有忍受，连点滴都舍不得打。

sentences.english: Vaillant's other main interest was the power of relationships.
sentences.chinese: 韦兰特的另一个主要兴趣是人际关系的力量。

sentences.english: She was admitted to hospital on 6 June, where she received oseltamivir treatment.
sentences.chinese: 6月6日被收住医院，接受了奥斯他韦治疗。

sentences.english: She completed the course of oseltamivir, recovered and was discharged.
sentences.chinese: 她接受了完整的奥斯他韦疗程治疗，痊愈后出院。

sentences.english: Cosway currently has a global member base of more than 650,000 people.
sentences.chinese: 科斯韦目前有超过650，000人的全球会员基地。

sentences.english: A few minutes later Weinstein picks me up in a chauffeur-driven car.
sentences.chinese: 几分钟之后，韦恩斯坦用专车接我过去。

sentences.english: We studied synthesis of adefovir in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 本论文是研究阿德福韦的合成工艺。

sentences.english: All the cases received oseltamivir treatment at the time of hospitalization.
sentences.chinese: 所有病例在住院期间均接受了奥斯他韦治疗。

definition: surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
